name: Flow Logo T-Shirt
description:
Flow Logo Tee. 
Shipping is expected to be around the next working day of the order.

The T-Shirts come with a one colour black print on 3 different colour shirts - Light Blue, White, Charcoal Grey.

Size Info
Men´s classic 150 gr jersey t-shirt
100% Cotton

M - Chest 53cm Length 72cm
L - Chest 56cm Length 74cm
XL - Chest 58cm Length 76cm

Please read the shipping info below before ordering.

If you dont have a Paypal account, please send us an email to info@flow-records.com and we will provide you with our bank transfer details.

If you are a Retailer, please email us to info@flow-records.com so we can send you a quote.

You will receive a notification e-mail from us when your order is shipped and please note International orders can take up to 21 days for delivery.

Please Note Shipping and Delivery

We mail via standard portuguese mail and air mail to the Rest of the World, if you require some special delivery for Portugal or tracking/international Signed For on International packages please e-mail us at info@flow-records.com before ordering.

Flow will not be accountable for lost or missing packages and we can provide evidence/proof of postage on every item that is shipped.

For all customers based in the EU please select GERMANY for your shipping charges and for all others outside Portugal and the EU please select Everywhere else.

Due to shipping problems to the following areas - South America, Mexico and Africa - extra shipping charges will apply as the packages need to be sent by International Signed For mail, so please e-mail us before placing your order and we will mail you with the additional information.

name: Flow Rising Sun T-Shirt
description:
Limited Edition Flow Rising Sun design T Shirts. Shipping is expected to be around the next working day of the order.

The t-shirts come with a two colour white and cyan blue print on 3 different colour shirts - Navy Green, Black, Charcoal Grey.

Size Info
Men´s classic 150 gr jersey t-shirt
100% Cotton

name: Flow Logo Hoodie
description:
Finally we have some hoodies for our fans. A ultra limited edition.

50% Cotton/50% Polyester 320 gr Hoodie with front pocket

info@flow-records.com

Available only on Mixed Grey with black logo, sizes M, L, XL

retailers only: its possible to manufacture other colours, please ask for quotation.

name: Flow Four Cd Bundle A
description:
We have four bundles with four cds each as a present to our fans. 
just email us on info@flow-records.com to get all bundles not listed.

its an extremely high value offer for these rarities

BUNDLE A
cd flow cds nº 2, 3, 4 and 5 

BUNDLE B
flow cds nº 5, 6, 9 and 13

BUNDLE C
flow albums - red seal, faktor-d, matenda and yotopia

flow cds nº 16, 17, 21 and 23
